This place was hard to find, the clue is Jerusalem Street, and it's about 2 blocks west of Las Ramblas.  Fantastically they are in full service even though a building is being put up around them.  You want to know how fresh their food is?  They told me I couldn't have a certain fish because the market had just closed and it couldn't be obtained.  Wow! That's dedication to fresh ingredients!  I started off with their fish soup which was so delicious it almost sent me into sexual ecstasy, ha ha, or maybe that was the red wine!  My main course was spaghetti with mussels.  Everything was delicious and fresh, couldn't ask for better.  I miss them already!
